allow: Bash(node -e "const fs=require\(''fs''\);const p=''c:/Users/Dule/Downloads/Vercel Ready/sourcingaigames-main ready - keep/data/teamGames.ts'';let c=fs.readFileSync\(p,''utf8''\);const count=c.split\(''''''\).length-1;console.log\(''Curly apostrophes found:'',count\);c=c.replace\(/''/g,""''""\);fs.writeFileSync\(p,c,''utf8''\);console.log\(''Fixed!''\);")

import sys
with open\(''$file'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)
